1.0.0.name: wordpress/carton
1.0.0.description: Create a truly unique design with Carton, a lightweight and fully responsive HTML5 theme built using jQuery Masonry. Use the new Theme Options customizer to add your own header image, custom background, column width and more. Distinguish each post with one of the eight supported post formats: Video, Image, Aside, Status, Audio, Quote, Link and Gallery. Install JetPack to display each of your galleries through a tiled view and jQuery carousel. Compatible with bbPress & BuddyPress. Built using SASS and Compass. Uses Google Fonts for improved typeface readability and works perfectly in desktop browsers, tablets and handheld devices. For a live demo go to http://demos.bavotasan.com/carton/.
